tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landmarks (
    landmark_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    landmark_description TEXT,
    latitude DECIMAL(9, 6) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(9, 6) NOT NULL,
    elevation DECIMAL(7, 2),
    date_built DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Landmarks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL,
    year_built INTEGER,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Tours (
    tour_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    landmark_id INTEGER REFERENCES Landmarks(id),
    duration INTERVAL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE landmarks (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    year_built INT,
    description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE landmark_categories (
    landmark_id UUID,
    category_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY(landmark_id, category_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tours (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    description STRING,
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE landmarks (
    landmark_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_name VARCHAR(100),
    location_geog GEOGRAPHY,
    date_established DATE,
    information TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
    category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE tours (
    tour_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_location_geog GEOGRAPHY,
    end_location_geog GEOGRAPHY,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE landmarks_categories (
    landmark_id UUID,
    category_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (landmark_id) REFERENCES landmarks(landmark_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tours_landmarks (
    tour_id UUID,
    landmark_id UUID,
    sequence INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES tours(tour_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (landmark_id) REFERENCES landmarks(landmark_id)
)
